39 #include <ros_pioneer/pioneer_config.h>
40 #include <boost/exception/diagnostic_information.hpp>

42 namespace ros_pioneer {
43 
44 bool PioneerConfig::loadFile(const std::string &filename)
45 {
46  std::ifstream file;
47  try{
48  file.open(filename.c_str());
49  }
50  catch (std::exception &e) {
51  ROS_ERROR("%s", e.what());
52  }
53  this->parseFile(file);
54  file.close();
55 }
56 
57 void PioneerConfig::parseFile(std::ifstream &file)
58 {
59  std::string line;
60  while (std::getline(file, line))
61  this->parseLine(line);
62 }
63 
64 void PioneerConfig::parseLine(const std::string &line)
65 {
66  static std::string section;
67  std::stringstream iss(line);
68  std::string data;
69  std::getline(iss, data, ';');
70  if (data.size() != 0 && !boost::starts_with(data, " ")) {
71  boost::trim(data);
72  std::vector<std::string> strings;
73  boost::split(strings,
74  data,
75  boost::is_any_of("\t "),
76  boost::token_compress_on);
77  if (strings[0].compare("Section") == 0)
78  section = this->getSection(strings);
79  else {
80  if (strings.size() == 1) {
81  // No data to be added!
82  }
83  else if (strings.size() == 2) {
84  this->addToMap(section + strings[0], strings[1]);
85  }
86  else {
87  this->addToMap(section + strings[0] + " " + strings[1], strings);
88  }
89  }
90  }
91 }
92 
93 bool PioneerConfig::isBool(const std::string &input)
94 {
95  std::string temp_in = boost::to_lower_copy(input);
96  if (temp_in.compare("true") == 0)
97  return true;
98  if (temp_in.compare("false")== 0)
99  return true;
100  return false;
101 }
102 
103 bool PioneerConfig::toBool(const std::string &input)
104 {
105  std::string temp_in = boost::to_lower_copy(input);
106  std::istringstream is(temp_in);
107  bool out;
108  is >> std::boolalpha >> out;
109  return out;
110 }
111 
112 bool PioneerConfig::isInteger(const std::string &input)
113 {
114  bool decimal = false;
115  bool sign = false;
116  for (size_t i = 0; i < input.size(); ++i) {
117  if (input[i] == '.')
118  return false;
119  else if (input[i] == '-' && !sign)
120  sign = true;
121  else if (!std::isdigit(input[i]))
122  return false;
123  }
124  return true;
125 }
126 
127 int PioneerConfig::toInteger(const std::string &input)
128 {
129  std::istringstream is(input);
130  int out;
131  is >> out;
132  return out;
133 }
134 
135 bool PioneerConfig::isDouble(const std::string &input)
136 {
137  bool decimal = false;
138  bool sign = false;
139  for (size_t i = 0; i < input.size(); ++i) {
140  if (input[i] == '.' && !decimal)
141  decimal = true;
142  else if (input[i] == '-' && !sign)
143  sign = true;
144  else if (!std::isdigit(input[i]))
145  return false;
146  }
147  return true;
148 }
149 
150 double PioneerConfig::toDouble(const std::string &input)
151 {
152  std::istringstream is(input);
153  double out;
154  is >> out;
155  return out;
156 }
157 
158 std::vector<int> PioneerConfig::toVector(const std::vector<std::string> &input)
159 {
160  std::vector<int> out;
161  for (int i = 2; i < input.size(); ++i)
162  out.push_back(this->toInteger(input[i]));
163  return out;
164 }
165 
166 void PioneerConfig::addToMap(const std::string &key, const std::string &value)
167 {
168  if (isBool(value))
169  configuration_[key] = toBool(value);
170  else if (isInteger(value))
171  configuration_[key] = toInteger(value);
172  else if (isDouble(value))
173  configuration_[key] = toDouble(value);
174  else
175  configuration_[key] = value;
176 }
177 
178 void PioneerConfig::addToMap(const std::string &key,
179  const std::vector<std::string> &value)
180 {
181  configuration_[key] = toVector(value);
182 }
183 
184 std::string PioneerConfig::getSection(std::vector<std::string> strings)
185 {
186  std::string section(strings[1]);
187  if (strings.size() != 2) {
188  if (isInteger(strings[2])) {
189  section += " " + strings[2];
190  }
191  }
192  section.append("/");
193  return section;
194 }
195 
196 bool PioneerConfig::getBool(const std::string &key) const
197 {
198  bool value;
199  std::map<std::string, boost::any>::const_iterator iter;
200  iter = configuration_.find(key);
201  try {
202  if (iter != configuration_.end())
203  value = boost::any_cast<bool>(iter->second);
204  else
205  ROS_ERROR("Key requested '%s' was not found", key.c_str());
206  }
207  catch (boost::exception &e) {
208  ROS_ERROR("Key requested is not bool, %s",
209  boost::diagnostic_information(e).c_str());
210  }
211  return (value);
212 }
213 
214 void PioneerConfig::setBool(const std::string &key, bool value)
215 {
216  configuration_[key] = value;
217 }
218 
219 int PioneerConfig::getInt(const std::string &key) const
220 {
221  int value;
222  std::map<std::string, boost::any>::const_iterator iter;
223  iter = configuration_.find(key);
224  try {
225  if (iter != configuration_.end())
226  value = boost::any_cast<int>(iter->second);
227  else
228  ROS_ERROR("Key requested '%s' was not found", key.c_str());
229  }
230  catch (boost::exception &e) {
231  ROS_ERROR("Key requested is not integer, %s",
232  boost::diagnostic_information(e).c_str());
233  }
234  return (value);
235 }

239  configuration_[key] = value;

242 double PioneerConfig::getDouble(const std::string &key) const
243 {
244  double value;
245  std::map<std::string, boost::any>::const_iterator iter;
246  iter = configuration_.find(key);
247  try {
248  if (iter != configuration_.end())
249  value = boost::any_cast<double>(iter->second);
250  else
251  ROS_ERROR("Key requested '%s' was not found", key.c_str());
252  }
253  catch (boost::exception &e) {
254  ROS_ERROR("Key requested is not double, %s",
255  boost::diagnostic_information(e).c_str());
256  }
257  return (value);
258 }

265 std::string PioneerConfig::getString(const std::string &key) const
266 {
267  std::string value;
268  std::map<std::string, boost::any>::const_iterator iter;
269  iter = configuration_.find(key);
270  try {
271  if (iter != configuration_.end())
272  value = boost::any_cast<std::string>(iter->second);
273  else
274  ROS_ERROR("Key requested '%s' was not found", key.c_str());
275  }
276  catch (boost::exception &e) {
277  ROS_ERROR("Key requested is not string, %s",
278  boost::diagnostic_information(e).c_str());
279  }
280  return (value);
281 }

288 std::vector<int> PioneerConfig::getIntVector(const std::string &key) const
289 {
290  std::vector<int> value;
291  std::map<std::string, boost::any>::const_iterator iter;
292  iter = configuration_.find(key);
293  try {
294  if (iter != configuration_.end())
295  value = boost::any_cast<std::vector<int> >(iter->second);
296  else
297  ROS_ERROR("Key requested '%s' was not found", key.c_str());
298  }
299  catch (boost::exception &e) {
300  ROS_ERROR("Key requested is not a vector of integers, %s",
301  boost::diagnostic_information(e).c_str());
302  }
303  return (value);
304 }

306 void PioneerConfig::setIntVector(const std::string &key, const std::vector<int> &value)
307 {
308  configuration_[key] = value;
309 }
